item.title: About
item.description: I am a MSc student in Pure Mathematics at the University of Athens. In 2024, I graduated from the Parisian Master of Research in Computer Science (MPRI) at Université Paris Cité. I did my master’s thesis at the Institut de Recherche en Informatique Fondamentale (IRIF). I was lucky to be under the supervision of Geoffroy Couteau and Sihang Pu. My internship was on the development of threshold signature schemes based on lattice assumptions.
